attributes.action: Bestow a Knighthood on British acting star Reg Varney
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many stars get recognition through awards,some such as the late Charlie Drake received nothing.Reg Varney lit up the lives of millions world-wide,film,tv,stage and musical work,now retired,he deserves a pat on the back from our generation...come on people,he even opened Britains first cash point machine.
